Heroes.Description: - Added unique {{HeroIcon|Hero=Haze|Size=20}} Haze footstep sound effects
- Fixed various movement stuck bugs with {{HeroIcon|Hero=Ivy|Size=20}} Ivy
- Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Kelvin|Size=20}} Kelvin’s Ice Beam sometimes not hitting Neutrals
- Fixed {{HeroIcon|Hero=Abrams|Size=20}} Abrams getting stuck on department store facade when using his ult
- Added new slide and reload animation for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Wraith|Size=20}} Wraith
- Fixed missing VO for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Yamato|Size=20}} Yamato ability use/upgrades
- Adjusted timing of select {{HeroIcon|Hero=Abrams|Size=20}} Abrams impact lines to time with either the rise of his leap or the descent accordingly
- Improved visibility of {{HeroIcon|Hero=Seven|Size=20}} Seven’s bullet and travel path
- Improved visibility of {{HeroIcon|Hero=Paradox|Size=20}} Paradox’s bullet and travel path
- Improved visibility of {{HeroIcon|Hero=Wraith|Size=20}} Wraith’s bullet and travel path
- Improved visibility of {{HeroIcon|Hero=Haze|Size=20}} Haze’s bullet and travel path
- Improved visibility of {{HeroIcon|Hero=Lady Geist|Size=20}} Lady Geist’s bullet and travel path
- Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Seven|Size=20}} Seven’s gun
- Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Paradox|Size=20}} Paradox’s gun
- Added custom tracer and muzzle flash for {{HeroIcon|Hero=Wraith|Size=20}} Wraith’s gun
- Shoulder charge now allows for a bit more steering control
- Hyperbeam width increased from 2.5m to 2.7m
- Base gun damage reduced from 18 to 15
- Gun damage growth reduced from +1.1 to +0.8
- Base Stamina increased from 2 to 3
- Fixed certain rooftops allowing turrets to be built on them
- Sandblast no longer prevents enemies from reloading while disarmed

Items.Description: - Weapon Damage while Shielded from 20% to 24%
- Now requires that shotguns middle pellet hit the target
- Now displays its current number of charges on its active icon
- Duration of no damage taken requirement reduced from 5s to 4s
- Flat portion of the lifesteal increased from 90 to 110
- Stun duration starts after hitting the ground
- Max Bullet Resist increased from 30% to 36%
- Damage reduced from 11% Max HP to 10%
- When below 40% HP you now gain 25% Spirit Resist
- {{ItemIcon|Item=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from 15% to 10%

Abilities.Description: - Fixed a few unit target abilities that could sometimes select a target behind a nearby wall (e.g. {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bebop|Size=20}} Bebop {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb)
- Added some additional visual tells for the receiving end of {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Lash|Size=20}} Lash’s {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Death Slam|Size=20}} Death Slam
- Improved {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Vindicta|Size=20}} Vindicta’s {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Stake|Size=20}} Stake effects to make it a little clearer when you are affected

- Fixed upgrading {{AbilityIcon|Ability=McGinnis|Size=20}} McGinnis’s {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Medicinal Specter|Size=20}} Medicinal Specter to T3 while active causing it to heal everyone to full instantly

- Fixed a bug that could cause all of {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Paradox|Size=20}} Paradox {{AbilityIcon|Ability={{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pulse|Size=20}} Pulse Grenade’s pulses to go off at once
- Allies now compliment teammates when they see impressive use of channeled abilities (for instance, Gigawatt killing three people with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Storm Cloud|Size=20}} Storm Cloud)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Siphon Life|Size=20}} Siphon Life T1 and T2 swapped
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sticky Bomb|Size=20}} Sticky Bomb T3 changed from Silence to Disarm
- Improved {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Hook|Size=20}} Hook hitbox detection to not grab targets that are behind cover
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Guided Owl|Size=20}} Guided Owl Spirit scaling reduced from 2.2 to 1.2
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Guided Owl|Size=20}} Guided Owl T3 changed from +200 damage to "Kills enemy heroes below 20%". Low health enemies are highlighted while guiding the owl.
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger no longer breaks invisibility when cast (previously was part of the T3)
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger Spirit scaling increased from 2.3 to 2.6
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger no longer gets +140 damage with the T3
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Sleep Dagger|Size=20}} Sleep Dagger T3 is now "-30% Damage Penalty On Victim for 4s after wakeup"
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance cast time increased from 0.7s to 0.8s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Bullet Dance|Size=20}} Bullet Dance evasion from 70% to 50%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kudzu Bomb|Size=20}} Kudzu Bomb duration increased from 3.5s to 4s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kudzu Bomb|Size=20}} Kudzu Bomb T2 duration increased from +1.5s to +2s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Watcher's Covenant|Size=20}} Watcher's Covenant Replicated Healing increased from 50% to 65%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Watcher's Covenant|Size=20}} Watcher's Covenant {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Fire Rate|Size=20}} Fire Rate reduced from 20% to 15%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Watcher's Covenant|Size=20}} Watcher's Covenant T1 changed to +15% Rate
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Frost Grenade|Size=20}} Frost Grenade cooldown reduced from 26s to 23s
- While {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ice Path|Size=20}} Ice Pathing you no longer slow down when you shoot your gun
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam Channel move speed increased from 4 to 6
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Arctic Beam|Size=20}} Arctic Beam T1 changed from "+2 Channel Move Speed" to -8s Cooldown
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Soul Exchange|Size=20}} Soul Exchange cast time reduced from 0.65s to 0.5s
- Fixed {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Malice|Size=20}} Malice clipping aggressively against map geometry edges
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike base Damage Per Meter reduced from 8 to 6
- Fixed some cases with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Ground Strike|Size=20}} Ground Strike not hitting units positioned just below the impact zone
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flog|Size=20}} Flog angle increased from 20 degrees to 30 degrees
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flog|Size=20}} Flog cooldown reduced from 35s to 30s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Scorn|Size=20}} Scorn healing against non-heroes reduced from 1x to 0.7x
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Kinetic Carbine|Size=20}} Kinetic Carbine Max Damage Amp reduced from 125% to 100%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Paradox|Size=20}} {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Paradoxical Swap|Size=20}} Paradoxical Swap range reduced from 45m to 40m
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage T3 added, now heals {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Pocket|Size=20}} Pocket for 100% of its damage (33% vs non-heroes)
- Fixed some issues with {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Barrage|Size=20}} Barrage projectiles getting caught on map geometry
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Cloak|Size=20}} Flying Cloak pathing improved, it will no longer bounce erratically off map geometry
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flight|Size=20}} Flight T3 reduced from +4m/s to +3m/s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crow Familiar|Size=20}} Crow Familiar T3 improved from -30% Healing Suppression to -40%
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Alchemical Flask|Size=20}} Alchemical Flask travel speed increased from 800 to 1000
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Royal Flush|Size=20}} Royal Flush no longer has a cast delay
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Royal Flush|Size=20}} Royal Flush time to spawn cards increased from 0.4s to 0.6s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Telekinesis|Size=20}} Telekinesis no longer allows the victim to shoot back
- Shadow Explosion renamed to {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation and reworked into a new ability
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation no longer has radius impact behavior

- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation now gives you 4.5s of invulnerability after the initial 2s invulnerable channel period. You transform and refresh your abilities, improving ability speeds by 60% and gaining unlimited ammo. "Ability Speeds" affects {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Power Slash|Size=20}} Power Slash cast time, {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Flying Strike|Size=20}} Flying Strike flying time, and {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Crimson Slash|Size=20}} Crimson Slash cast time.
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation cooldown increased from 90s to 100s
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation T2 is now +4 m/s during Shadow Form
- {{AbilityIcon|Ability=Shadow Transformation|Size=20}} Shadow Transformation T3 is now +1s duration

General.Description: - Playtesting times are now starting 1 hour earlier. Weekdays are 5PM PDT and weekends are 3PM PDT.
- Added in-game custom item builds support. Create your own builds or browse builds from the community in the heroes page.
- Added post game player reporting option
- Ally player glow-through-world silhouette now communicates their current health
- Added ambient music track
- Fixed various issues with mic audio input and lag it introduced
- Small adjustments to how the crosshair UI area looks
- Mic input device is now selected from in-game settings rather than the steam client
- Improved various networking and hit registration related issues (this was released a couple days ago)
- Updated Trooper and Neutral shooting sound effects
- Various improvements to damage audio clarity for victims and attackers
- Sped up select Amber Hand VO that related to game state (shrines being under attack, protecting the urn runner etc)
- Adding game audio muted indicator in top left if the game is muted
- Camera can now be moved while the game is paused in replays
- Fixed the Rejuvenator falling during pause
- Fixed the Idol falling during pause
- Fixed the bottom most shop items having part of their icon be unclickable
- Updated Bullet Shredder debuff effects
- Mid-Boss is now invulnerable if there are no enemies it can actually attack
- Fixed your active items not hiding in the UI when you are dead and spectating a team mate
- Added support for binding mouse1 and mouse2 to any key (this was released a couple days ago)
- Added alt info to recent damage view to make it clearer that this can be brought up again after it disappears
- Fixed being able to see some things through the Veils in the map that you shouldn’t be able to see
- Removed stack of cardboard boxes inside connection hallway near bases to prevent cover from Neutrals
- Fixed getting stuck under stair at inner lanes near Guardian
- Sapphire side materials tint color changed to white
- Sapphire side street materials changed to new asphalt blend
- Out of combat run animation variants now only play during sprint state

Misc Gameplay.Description: - Adjusted map around the middle lanes to have an area with Veils for laning
- Hero kill bounty ratio between Killer and Assister reduced from 2.75x to 2.55x (means slightly more to the Assister)
- Spirit scaling reduced by ~15% (the total effective Spirit damage is reduced by less than this, this is just the Spirit multiplier scaling portion and has largest impact on late game burst)
- Vaults base bounty increased from 220 to 260
- Strong Neutrals Spirit Resist increased from 25% to 35%
- Medium Neutrals Spirit Resist increased from 25% to 30%
- Starting at 15 minutes, one melee Trooper per wave will spawn with 1.75x health
- Medic Trooper health increased from 240 to 260
- Sidelane Veils near Guardians are now one-way visibility (used to be blocked visibility in both directions)
- Neutrals can now lean side to side to fire when obstructed by map geometry and being attacked
- Zipline Boost ability speed increased from 100% to 130%
- Zipline Boost ability ramp time to reach max speed reduced from 2s to 1s
- Zipline base speed boost after Base Guardians are killed increased from 100% to 120%
- Zipline base speed boost's ramp time after Base Guardians are killed reduced from 5s to 4s
- Being Disarmed no longer prevents you from reloading

Item Gameplay.Description: - Shifting Shroud: Cooldown reduced from 70s to 55s
